get.description: Retrieves the user settings for the Acquisitions plugin module
Retrieves the currencies for the Acquisitions plugin module
Retrieves a list of patrons who have acquisitions permissions
Retrieves the tasks for the Acquisitions plugin module

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Owner of the task

parameters.name: created_by_id
parameters.description: Creator of the task

parameters.name: _match
parameters.description: Matching criteria

parameters.name: _order_by
parameters.description: Sorting criteria

parameters.name: _page
parameters.description: Page number, for paginated object listing

parameters.name: _per_page
parameters.description: Page size, for paginated object listing

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query filter sent as a request parameter

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of task to fetch

parameters.name: x-koha-embed
parameters.description: Embed

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of task to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Task object that needs to be added

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of task to delete
